summary: An Ordinance providing for the transfer of the sum $34,057.52 from the Light Fund to the Judgment Fund for the purpose of paying the judgment of Haggard v. The City of Seattle (Cause No. 60210) and Abrams, et al. v. The City of Seattle (Cause No. 66854) for personal injuries received through coming in contact with electric current of the Municipal Light and Power Plant.
